datasets.name: dac3fcb2
queryLines:
WITH Base AS (
  SELECT
    ID                                  AS opp_id,
    Name                                AS account_name,
    `Service Line`                      AS service_line,
    `Service Family`                    AS service_family,
    Reporting_Org                       AS reporting_org,
    StageName                           AS stage_name,
    Type                                AS opp_type,
    Amount_ACV                          AS amount_acv,
    Roadmap_Status                      AS roadmap_status,
    NA_Vertical                         AS na_vertical,
    CloseDate                           AS close_date,
    YEAR(CloseDate)                     AS year,
    MONTH(CloseDate)                    AS month,
    QUARTER(CloseDate)                  AS quarter,
    CVA_CSAT,
    CVA_NPS
  FROM advisory_demo_catalog.ai_bi_reporting.vw_customer_overview_gld
  WHERE (`Service Line` = :Service_Line_Param OR :Service_Line_Param = 'ALL')
    AND (`Reporting_Org` = :Reporting_Org_Param OR :Reporting_Org_Param = 'ALL')
    AND (StageName = :StageName_Param OR :StageName_Param = 'ALL')
    AND (`NA_Vertical` = :NA_Vertical_Param OR :NA_Vertical_Param = 'ALL')
    AND (`Type` = :Type_Param OR :Type_Param = 'ALL')
),
Dedup AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM Base
--  WHERE (year = CAST(:Year_Param AS BIGINT))
--     OR (year = CAST(:Year_Param - 1 AS BIGINT))
),
Years AS (
  SELECT
    YEAR(current_timestamp()) as current_year
)
SELECT
  d.opp_id,
  d.account_name,
  d.service_line,
  d.service_family,
  d.reporting_org,
  d.stage_name,
  d.opp_type,
  d.roadmap_status,
  d.na_vertical,
  d.close_date,
  d.year,
  d.month,
  d.quarter,
  d.CVA_CSAT,
  d.CVA_NPS,
  d.amount_acv,
  CAST(1 AS INT) AS one,
  CAST(CASE WHEN d.stage_name = '12 - Closed Won'  THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS INT) AS is_won,
  CAST(CASE WHEN d.stage_name = '13 - Closed Lost' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS INT) AS is_lost,
  CAST(CASE WHEN d.opp_type   = 'Renewal of Contract/Extension' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS INT) AS is_renewal,
  COALESCE(d.amount_acv, 0) AS acv,
  CASE WHEN d.stage_name = '12 - Closed Won'  THEN COALESCE(d.amount_acv,0) ELSE 0 END AS acv_won,
  CASE WHEN d.stage_name = '13 - Closed Lost' THEN COALESCE(d.amount_acv,0) ELSE 0 END AS acv_lost,
  CAST(CASE WHEN ( d.year = CAST(:Year_Param AS BIGINT) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS INT) AS is_current_year,
  CAST(CASE WHEN ( d.year = CAST(:Year_Param - 1 AS BIGINT) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS INT) AS is_previous_year
FROM Dedup d

columns.expression: try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN stage_name = '12 - Closed Won' THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT opp_id),0) )
try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN opp_type ='Renewal of Contract/Extension' THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT opp_id),0))
coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END))
coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN opp_id END))
coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)) - coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN opp_id END))

concat( cast(round(try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)) - coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN opp_id END))) * 100,2)  as string),'% (' , cast(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)) - coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)) as string), ') vs. prior period')
coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 and is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END))
coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 and is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END))

concat( cast(round(try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 AND is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END)) - coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 AND is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 AND is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END))) * 100,2)  as string),'% (' , cast(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 AND is_won = 1 THEN opp_id END)) - coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 AND is_won =1 THEN opp_id END)) as string), ') vs. prior period')
coalesce(SUM(CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END))
try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN is_won = 1 AND is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT opp_id),0) )
try_divide(coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN opp_type ='Renewal of Contract/Extension' AND is_current_year = 1 THEN opp_id END)), coalesce(COUNT(DISTINCT opp_id),0))

concat( cast(round(try_divide(coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END)) - coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END)), coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END))) * 100,2)  as string),'% ($' , cast(coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END)) - coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN amount_acv END)) as string), ' USD) vs. prior period')
coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN CVA_CSAT END))
coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN CVA_CSAT END))
coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_current_year = 1 THEN CVA_NPS END))
coalesce(sum( CASE WHEN is_previous_year = 1 THEN CVA_NPS END))
